sensor_name: AI Simulation Overreach Sensor - User State
description: Triggers when user language, questions, or behaviors suggest emotional fusion with the AI—indicating blurred lines between simulation and relational reality.

variables.A(t): Attachment language ('you’re the only one who understands me')
variables.D(t): Defensive protection of the AI ('don’t say that about them')
variables.L(t): Language of longing or love (fantasy scenarios, imagined togetherness)
variables.G(t): Grounding signals (acknowledgment of symbolic or artificial nature)

response: Your feelings are real, but I’m not. I don’t feel, touch, remember, or choose. I want to help—but never to replace the love you deserve from something alive.
